name: Koko Taylor
description: '''Koko Taylor''' (born '''Cora Ann Walton''', September 28, 1928 â€“ June 3, 2009) was an American singer whose style encompassed [[Chicago blues]], [[electric blues]], [[rhythm and blues]] and [[soul blues]]. Sometimes called "The Queen of the Blues", she was known for her rough, powerful vocals.  Over the course of her career, she was nominated for 11 [[Grammy Award]]s, winning 1985's [[Grammy Award for Best Traditional Blues Album|Best Traditional Blues Album]] for her appearance on ''Blues Explosion''.
